about_the_game:
GridFiller Think. Rotate. Fill.

Dive into the vibrant world of GridFiller, a minimalist yet deeply satisfying block puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning and logic skills. Your mission is simple: fill every square on the grid. But with obstacles in your way and uniquely shaped blocks to maneuver, each level becomes a thrilling test of strategy and creativity.

Key Features:

🧩 200+ Unique Levels: A massive collection of handcrafted puzzles, from beginner-friendly to brain-bending challenges.

🎨 Colorful Aesthetics: Clean, modern design with soothing colors to keep you immersed.

🔄 Dynamic Mechanics: Rotate, move, and fit blocks with precision as you solve each grid.

🎵 Relaxing Soundtrack: Chill to a lo-fi soundtrack while you focus on the task at hand.

Whetheryou're a casual gamer looking for a relaxing puzzle experience or a hardcore enthusiast seeking a challenge, GridFiller offers a rewarding journey of logic and perfection.

Are you ready to fill the grid?

name: GridFiller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: ４ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHzorAMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660Ti, 2 GBorAMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: GridFiller is a minimalist block puzzle game that tests your spatial reasoning and logic. Rotate, move, and fit blocks to fill every square on the grid while navigating obstacles. Featuring 200+ handcrafted levels, vibrant visuals, and a relaxing lo-fi soundtrack, it's perfect for puzzle enthusiasts
